name: Diamond Sword
description: A powerful sword made from pure diamond, capable of slicing through even the toughest armor.
looks: The Diamond Sword has a long, silver blade with a sharp edge. The hilt is made from a combination of diamond and gold, giving it a luxurious appearance.

name: Steel Gauntlets
description: A pair of steel gauntlets that provide excellent hand protection.
looks: The gauntlets are made of sturdy steel plates, covering the entire hand and extending up to the forearms. They have a polished silver finish and intricate engravings.

name: Steel Boots
description: A pair of sturdy boots made from steel
looks: The boots are made of polished steel and have a sleek design. They come up to the mid-calf and have thick soles for added durability.

name: Steel Greaves
description: Protective leg armor made from sturdy steel.
looks: The steel greaves are a pair of shin guards made from thick steel plates. They have leather straps and buckles for a secure fit.

name: Ruby Wand
description: A wand made from pure ruby, imbued with powerful magical energy.
looks: The Ruby Wand is a slender rod made entirely of gleaming red ruby. It is smooth to the touch and emits a faint glow.

special_effects.spellpower_boost: Boosts the power of fire spells

name: Iron Sword
description: A standard iron sword, suitable for everyday combat.
looks: The iron sword has a straight, double-edged blade with a simple hilt made of leather-wrapped metal. It has a moderate length, making it versatile for different fighting styles.

special_weapon_skills.sword_fighting: Grants a bonus to Sword Fighting skill when wielded.

name: Sword of the Warrior
description: A powerful sword crafted for skilled warriors.
looks: The Sword of the Warrior has a large, single-edged blade with a sharp tip. The hilt is wrapped in black leather and engraved with intricate runes.

special_weapon_skils.swordsmanship: Grants a bonus to Swordsmanship skill when wielded.

name: Flaming Sword
description: A sword engulfed in flames, radiating intense heat.
looks: The Flaming Sword has a long, curved blade that glows with fiery red and orange hues. Flames dance along the length of the blade, giving off a pulsating heat. The hilt is wrapped in flame-embossed leather, providing a secure grip.

special_effects.fire_damage: Deals additional fire damage with each strike.

special_weapon_skills.sword: Grants a bonus to Sword skill when wielded.

name: Steel Gauntlets
description: Heavy gauntlets made of steel for added hand protection in combat.
looks: The steel gauntlets are large and sturdy, covering the hands and extending up the forearms. They are made of polished steel with engraved patterns and have reinforced knuckles.

name: Bronze Sword
description: A basic sword made of bronze.
looks: The bronze sword has a simple and practical design. The blade is straight and slightly curved near the tip, with a bronze hilt and handle wrapped in leather for a comfortable grip.
